name: Introduction to Philosophy
description: An introduction to the major topics in philosophy, including the history of philosophy, epistemology, metaphysics, ethics, and aesthetics.

name: History of Political Philosophy
description: A survey of the major political philosophers, from the ancient Greeks to the modern era, and their important works.

name: Political Theory
description: An in-depth study of the major political theorists, their ideas and arguments, and the implications of their works.

name: Continental Political Philosophy
description: An exploration of the major themes of continental political philosophy, including Marx, Nietzsche, and Foucault.
